meanings.definition: The launching of a rocket or spacecraft.
meanings.sent1: The blastoff was a spectacular sight in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The countdown led to the exciting blastoff of the rocket.
meanings.sent3: Everyone cheered as the blastoff lit up the night.
meanings.sent4: The blastoff was like a fiery arrow shooting into space.
meanings.sent5: The blastoff echoed through the valley, leaving everyone in awe.

meanings.definition: The moment when a rocket or spacecraft is launched.
meanings.sent1: We watched the blastoff with amazement.
meanings.sent2: The blastoff signaled the beginning of the mission.
meanings.sent3: The blastoff seemed to defy gravity, making us all gasp.
meanings.sent4: The blastoff was a symbol of human ingenuity and exploration.
meanings.sent5: The blastoff marked the start of a new chapter in space exploration.
